clinical_study.brief_title: Certification Standards and Diagnostic Accuracy for Surgeon-performed Ultrasonography
clinical_study.official_title: Certification Standards and Diagnostic Accuracy for Surgeon-performed Ultrasonography

brief_summary.textblock: Ultrasonography (US) is an operator depended image modality that is difficult to reproduce and interpret by others. Competence of the US operator is crucial for reliable diagnostics but no evidence-based certification of head and neck US skills has been developed. Investigators conducted an experimental study aimed to explore diagnostic accuracy and establish validity evidence for certification standards in surgeon-performed ultrasonography.

primary_outcome.measure: Competence score on a generic skills assessment scale (The Objective Structured Assessment of Ultrasound Skills (OSAUS))
primary_outcome.description: Performance were video-recorded Maj 25, 2013 and afterwards assessed by a consultant in diagnostic radiology and a consultant in head and neck surgery

secondary_outcome.measure: Diagnostic accuracy assessed by a head and neck surgeon reading the ultrasonography report
secondary_outcome.description: Assessed by a head and neck surgeon reading the ultrasonography report of the participating physicians from the experimental study conducted Maj 25, 2013

arm_group.description: Attending physicians and consultants in head and neck surgery using head and neck Ultrasonography on a daily basis.
Physicians participating in their one-year internship at other surgical or medical departments with no experience with head and neck US or head and neck surgery.

intervention.description: This study is a psychometric validation of a generic assessment tool to evaluate ultrasonography competence among surgeons

criteria.textblock:
1. Ultrasonography-experienced surgeons
Inclusion Criteria:
- Board certified otolaryngologist
- Daily use of head and neck Ultrasonography
2. Ultrasonography novices:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Medical doctor during internship
Exclusion Criteria:
- experience with head and neck Ultrasonography
- experience with head and neck surgery
